## Unity Catalog Constitution Compliance

- [ ] CHK-API API changes specified in `api/all.yaml` first (if applicable)
- [ ] CHK-COMPAT Backward compatibility maintained for all API changes
- [ ] CHK-SCHEMA Avoided modifying existing table/model schemas
- [ ] CHK-SECRETS No secrets committed to version control
- [ ] CHK-STYLE Code passes `build/sbt javafmtCheckAll`
- [ ] CHK-BUILD Project compiles with `build/sbt compile`
- [ ] CHK-TEST All tests pass with `build/sbt test`
- [ ] CHK-HELM Helm charts updated for config changes
